skills.name: Spread Fire
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], deals <color=#FFFFFFFF>1 $[K5]</color> to all opposing characters on standby.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>, deals <color=#FFFFFFFF>1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color></color> to all opposing characters on standby.
skills.description: Deals 1 Pyro DMG, deals 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby.

skills.name: Combined Fire
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT] and then separately performs "$[K53]" for <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S33085]</color> and <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S33086]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> and then separately performs "<color=#FFFFFFFF>Prepare Skill</color>" for <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combined Fire: Light Barrage</color> and <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combined Fire: Piercing Salvo</color>.
skills.description: Deals 2 Pyro DMG and then separately performs "Prepare Skill" for Combined Fire: Light Barrage and Combined Fire: Piercing Salvo.

skills.name: Arkhe: Ousia
skills.descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After being damaged by characters with "{SPRITE_PRESET#3505}Arkhe: Pneuma,"</color> this character will become $[K1014], and <color=#FFFFFFFF>cannot use skills</color> until this Round ends.
skills.descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After being damaged by characters with "{SPRITE_PRESET#3505}Arkhe: Pneuma,"</color> this character will become <color=#FFFFFFFF>Deactivated</color>, and <color=#FFFFFFFF>cannot use skills</color> until this Round ends.
skills.description: After being damaged by characters with "Arkhe: Pneuma," this character will become Deactivated, and cannot use skills until this Round ends.

skills.name: Combined Fire: Light Barrage
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Prepare for 1 turn)\nDeals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>. Then, perform "<color=#FFFFFFFF>Prepare Skill</color>" for <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combined Fire: Piercing Salvo</color>.
skills.description:
(Prepare for 1 turn)
Deals 2 Pyro DMG. Then, perform "Prepare Skill" for Combined Fire: Piercing Salvo.
